body_html:
@mrry interesting .... the the following example is similar, is it also going to run the op on an arbitrary machine?

server = tf.Server(...)
sess = tf.Session(server.target)
with tf.device("/gpu:0"):
   sess.run(tf.random_uniform())

body:
@mrry interesting .... the the following example is similar, is it also going to run the op on an arbitrary machine?

```
server = tf.Server(...)
sess = tf.Session(server.target)
with tf.device("/gpu:0"):
   sess.run(tf.random_uniform())
```
